Text:
downloaded, and when I press "World of Warcraft" application nothing happents... What should i do?
I am rumming on MacBook Pro 13" late 2011. OS X version 10.8.2. Help me plz =)

1. Open terminal
2. Right click on World of Warcraft, select view package content. 
3. Browse around, look for a file called World of Warcraft. The icon should be blank, and the file size should be larger then the rest.
4. On the terminal, type chmod u+x
5. Drag the file to the terminal, and press enter.
Thx slanx! It works now!

Hi, Im having the same problem as petrob13 and tryed with chmod u+x but it still doesn't work.

I really want to play WoW again so plz somebody help me !!
After some time it comes out at the torrent downloader "Error: ReadFromDisk: No such file or directory"

can try 

"sudo chmod u+x" instead, space after x then drag file over, press return

Thx it works !!!

"chmod u+x" did not work the first time.

I tried again later but with a SPACE after the X and it worked perfect
Yes ! Thanks a lot slanx !
